lead_paragraph: Less than a week after being told he would probably need surgery on his ailing pitching elbow, Milwaukee Brewers pitcher Chris Capuano has decided to try rehabilitation that would allow him to play this season. The Brewers placed the left-handed Capuano on the 15-day disabled list, retroactive to March 21.
